clusterList.phrase: you're forever preaching at people about how you should forgive people you need to forgive people too
be merciful to me a sinner
too bad for you then sin that i'm way past stupid from what you people have done for me

do not deceive yourself in vain for we are suffering these things on our own account because of our sins against our own god therefore astounding things have happened but do not think that you will go unpunished for having tried to fight against god
but i know you'll forgive me-just like i'll forgive you for the gun
when you've paid for what you've done then i'll forgive
if you forgive the sins of any they are forgiven them if you retain the sins of any they are retained
